dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...and like, it's just wild, the sheer amount of storm warnings they've issued for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...and like, it's just wild, the sheer amount of storm warnings they've issued for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A storm warning has been issued for Astana and 13 regions of the country, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my gosh, I saw that headline! Kazhydromet, right? Seriously, for Astana alone, it's like rain, fog, ice...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my gosh, I saw that headline! Kazhydromet, right? Seriously, for Astana alone, it's like rain, fog, ice...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana " Rain is expected in the morning and afternoon. Fog, ice at night and in the morning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And those wind gusts! 15 to 20 meters per second, uh, during the day?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And those wind gusts! fifteen to twenty meters per second, uh, during the day?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: South, southwest wind with gusts of 15-20 meters per second during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And it's not just the capital! Ulytau, Karaganda, they're getting fog, icy roads, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And it's not just the capital! Ulytau, Karaganda, they're getting fog, icy roads, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ulytau Region " Fog is expected at times in the west, north, and east of the region. Karaganda Region " Fog is expected at times in the west, north, and east of the region, with icy roads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And Kostanay is like, rain and snow at night, plus more ice formation. Like, can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And Kostanay is like, rain and snow at night, plus more ice formation. Like, can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kostanay Region " Precipitation (rain, snow) is expected at night in the northern half of the region, with ice formation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, seriously! And then Akmola, fog and ice, and those super high gusts up to 25 meters per second? Uh, that's almost hurricane force.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, seriously! And then Akmola, fog and ice, and those super high gusts up to twenty five meters per second? Uh, that's almost hurricane force.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Akmola Region " Precipitation (rain, snow) is expected at night in the west, north, and east of the region, with rain during the day. Fog and ice are expected in the west, north, and east. South, southwest wind of 15-20 meters per second, with gusts of up to 25 meters per second in the west, north, and east.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And Atyrau, fog, wind, then Abai has more gusts reaching 25 meters per second!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And Atyrau, fog, wind, then Abai has more gusts reaching twenty five meters per second!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Atyrau Region " Fog is expected in the west and south of the region at night and in the morning. South, southwest wind with gusts of 15-20 meters per second in the west and north. Abai Region " In the north and central parts of the region, east, southeast wind of 15-20 meters per second is expected, with gusts reaching 25 meters per second during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But wait, did you see Mangystau? A dust storm! Uh, during the day! Like, that's a whole other level of weather warning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, did you see Mangystau? A dust storm! Uh, during the day! Like, that's a whole other level of weather warning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mangystau Region " A dust storm is expected during the day in the west and central parts of the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's just... everything! How do you even prepare for all that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's just... everything! How do you even prepare for all that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's like every single adverse weather condition they could possibly list, just, all at once. And for so many regions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like every single adverse weather condition they could possibly list, just, all at once. And for so many regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! West, East, North Kazakhstan, Pavlodar, like, it's just widespread across the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! West, East, North Kazakhstan, Pavlodar, like, it's just widespread across the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West Kazakhstan Region " Fog is expected in the west, north, and east. ... East Kazakhstan Region " Fog is expected in the north of the region at night and in the morning. North Kazakhstan Region " Precipitation (rain, snow) is expected at night in the west and north of the region... Pavlodar Region " Fog and ice are expected in the west and north.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously, the whole country just got hit with a meteorologist's worst nightmare, uh, all at once.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously, the whole country just got hit with a meteorologist's worst nightmare, uh, all at once.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep. Good luck to everyone out there in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep. Good luck to everyone out there in Kazakhstan.
